verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; every <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
<S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>,
<S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>,
<S%H1835>Dan<s%>, and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and <S%H836>Asher<s%>.

And all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H3409>body<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> were <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>: for <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was in Egypt <S%H4714>already<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and all his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and all that <S%H1755>generation<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and increased <S%H8317>abundantly<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, and grew <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H6105>mighty<s%>; and the <S%H776>land<s%> was filled with <S%H4390>them<s%>.
Now there arose <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which <S%H3045>knew<s%> not <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H5971>Behold<s%>, the people of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H7227>more<s%> and mightier than <S%H6099>we<s%>:

Come <S%H3051>on<s%>, let us deal <S%H2449>wisely<s%> with <S%H7235>them<s%>; lest they multiply, and it come to <S%H7122>pass<s%>, that, when there falls out any <S%H4421>war<s%>, <S%H1931>they<s%> <S%H3254>join<s%> also unto our <S%H8130>enemies<s%>, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H5927>us<s%>, and so get them up out of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Therefore they did <S%H7760>set<s%> over them <S%H4522>taskmasters<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them with their <S%H5450>burdens<s%>. And they <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4543>treasure<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, <S%H6619>Pithom<s%> and <S%H7486>Raamses<s%>.

But the more they <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H3651>them<s%>, the more they <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> and <S%H6555>grew<s%>. And they were <S%H6973>grieved<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H5647>made<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> with <S%H6531>rigor<s%>:

And they <S%H4843>made<s%> their <S%H2416>lives<s%> <S%H4843>bitter<s%> with <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>bondage<s%>, in <S%H2563>mortar<s%>, and in <S%H3843>brick<s%>, and in all manner of <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: all their <S%H5656>service<s%>, where they made them <S%H5647>serve<s%>, was with <S%H6531>rigor<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H3205>midwives<s%>, of which the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H8236>Shiphrah<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6326>Puah<s%>:

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, When you do the office of a <S%H3205>midwife<s%> to the Hebrew <S%H5680>women<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> them upon the <S%H70>stools<s%>; if it be a <S%H1121>son<s%>, then you shall <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H1323>him<s%>: but if it be a daughter, then she shall <S%H2425>live<s%>.

But the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> not as the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H1696>commanded<s%> <S%H2421>them<s%>, but saved the men <S%H3206>sons<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H3205>midwives<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4069>them<s%>, Why have you <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, and have <S%H2421>saved<s%> the men <S%H3206>sons<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>?

And the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, Because the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> are not as the Egyptian <S%H4713>women<s%>; for they are <S%H2422>lively<s%>, and are <S%H3205>delivered<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> come in unto <S%H935>them<s%>.
Therefore <S%H430>God<s%> dealt <S%H3190>well<s%> with the <S%H3205>midwives<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, and grew <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6105>mighty<s%>.
And it came to <S%H3205>pass<s%>, because the midwives <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, that he <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H1004>houses<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Every <S%H1121>son<s%> that is <S%H3209>born<s%> you shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H2975>river<s%>, and every <S%H1323>daughter<s%> you shall save <S%H2421>alive<s%>.
